Title: Python
Text: I have been learning python for a while now, and have learned the basics of pl$. I feel like a real programmer now! I don't really know what I'm doing, but I know enough to follow directions. This is good enough for what I want to do. I have a school project I am doing on using the word matrix to sort data. I used Matplotlib to set up the whole matplotlib drawing, and will probably use that for my library.
